text:
Mainly here because of Shengsiong supermarket which is one of its biggest outlet. The entire basement is occupied by Sheng Siong supermarket and offer a huge range of groceries, toiletries, fresh food and meats, etc.
Surrounded by parallel parking lots and can have a meal too at the food centre Berseh food centre beside before or after grocery shopping.

It's popular shopping mall for Heartlanders
residing in Rowell Court, Race Course Estate as well as Kelantan Estate, abounding King
George's Estates.
The Mall has its attractions of Sheng Siong
Department Store in the Basement.   The
first level offers sanitary essential [s]: Hoe Kee.
There's a Japanese Restaurant on the first
level as well.

Plenty of hardware shops, lighting shops etc here. There is even a sheng shiong here. Near to lim ah boy and has jalan bear hawker centre nearby for food. Walking distance (?) To the mrt station. May be too far for some though.

I do interest to see the new world as google show but after we walk away from mrt lavender 7 minutes. I only found new world center and nothing else. We walk street and turn right untill Mustafa center to get city hall mrt
We have our groceries shopping in the place once awhile. You can find sheng siong supermarket  here at B1. And other lights and hardwares shop.
